title: Hodge-Lyubeznik numbers
abstract:
We define a Hodge-theoretical refinement of the Lyubeznik numbers for local
rings of complex algebraic varieties. We prove that these numbers are
independent of the choices made in their definition and that, for the local
ring of an isolated singularity, they can be expressed in terms of the Hodge
numbers of the cohomology of the link of the singularity. We give examples of
isolated singularities with the same Lyubeznik numbers but different
Hodge-Lyubeznik numbers.
